alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Sandusky; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 19 at 5:26PM EST until January 19 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Huron County in north central Ohio... Eastern Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Erie County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 615 PM EST. * At 526 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Green Springs, or 10 miles northeast of Tiffin, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Sandusky, Tiffin, Norwalk, Western Vermilion, Bellevue, Clyde, Green Springs, Northern Milan, Milan, Wakeman, Bloomville, Castalia, Monroeville, Attica, Berlin Heights, North Fairfield, Republic, Flat Rock, Bloomingville and Sandusky South. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
